trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> instances.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object into the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object to insert.
Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>.
Determines if the collection contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object to locate.
`true` if item is in the collection; otherwise, `false`.

Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> objects in the collection into an array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>, starting at the specified index position.
The destination array.
The zero-based index position where copying begins.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>.
The number of objects in the collection.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
An enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object within the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object to locate.
The zero-based index of item, if found; otherwise -1;
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object at the specified index position in the collection.
The zero-based index position to insert the object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object to insert.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref> is read-only.
`true` if the collection is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> that is stored at the zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref> from which to get or set the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref>.
The element at the specified index.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object to remove.
`true` if item was successfully deleted; otherwise `false`.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface"></xref> object from the collection at the specified index.
The zero-based index position from where to delete the object.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
A zero-based <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>.
The first position in the specified <xref href="System.Array"></xref> to receive the copied contents.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Contains(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IndexOf(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>.
The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index at which to insert the <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypefaceCollection"></xref>.
